author: robwaugh1974
title: Matador’s anal sphincter is ‘completely destroyed’ as he is gored up the bottom by bull
text:
A matador was left seriously injured after a raging bull gored him up the rectum in a bullfiight in Mexico city – with its left horn penetrating 12 inches up his rectum.
Mother refused to breastfeed newborn son 'because he looked like an alien' Matador Antonio Romero was hospitalised – and was seen writhing in pain on the ground after the a 1,160-pound bull named Caporal attacked.
Dr. Rafael Vázquez Bayod said that he had suffered ‘very, very serious damage to his anorectal region’.
The doctor said that Caporal’s horn ‘completely destroyed the anal sphincter and very seriously damaged the rectum.’
&&&&& To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Paramedic Felipe Sanchez said, ‘It is a serious and deep goring approximately 30 centimeters. We will operate it in the hospital.
